questions.question: What is the difference between preemption and non-preemption?

answers.a: Whether or not a ready process can be involuntarily terminated
answers.b: Whether or not a process in the middle of execution can be  interrupted
answers.c: Whether or not a blocked process can have its resources involuntarily taken away from it
answers.d: Waiting time is more in preemptive scheduling and less in non-preemptive

explanations.b: Preemptive scheduling - Processor can be preempted to execute a different process in the middle of execution of any current process.Non-preemptive scheduling - Once a Processor starts to execute a process it must finish it before executing the other. It cannot be paused in the middle.

questions.question: In which of the following Algorithms does the first process get allocated to the CPU first?

answers.c: can be preeptive or non preemptive
